mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CLOSE_DATE AS closeDate, PREV_DAY_CASH_SENDING_AMT AS prevDayCashSendingAmt, DEPOSIT_AMT AS depositAmt, GIVE_AMT AS giveAmt, CLOSE_AMT AS closeAmt, NONE_PROCESS_AMT AS noneProcessAmt, RTRVL_FUND AS rtrvlFund, NONE_PROCESS_AT AS noneProcessAt, MNG_OFFICE AS mngOffice, ADJUST_LACK_AMT_COUNT AS adjustLackAmtCount, ADJUST_LACK_AMT AS adjustLackAmt FROM ATMS_03001140

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CLOSE_DATE AS closeDate, PREV_DAY_CASH_SENDING_AMT AS prevDayCashSendingAmt, DEPOSIT_AMT AS depositAmt, GIVE_AMT AS giveAmt, CLOSE_AMT AS closeAmt, NONE_PROCESS_AMT AS noneProcessAmt, RTRVL_FUND AS rtrvlFund, NONE_PROCESS_AT AS noneProcessAt, MNG_OFFICE AS mngOffice, ADJUST_LACK_AMT_COUNT AS adjustLackAmtCount, ADJUST_LACK_AMT AS adjustLackAmt FROM ATMS_03001140 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CLOSE_DATE = #{closeDate}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_03001140 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CLOSE_DATE = #{closeDate}

UPDATE ATMS_03001140 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, PREV_DAY_CASH_SENDING_AMT = #{prevDayCashSendingAmt}, DEPOSIT_AMT = #{depositAmt}, GIVE_AMT = #{giveAmt}, CLOSE_AMT = #{closeAmt}, NONE_PROCESS_AMT = #{noneProcessAmt}, RTRVL_FUND = #{rtrvlFund}, NONE_PROCESS_AT = #{noneProcessAt}, MNG_OFFICE = #{mngOffice}, ADJUST_LACK_AMT_COUNT = #{adjustLackAmtCount}, ADJUST_LACK_AMT = #{adjustLackAmt} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CLOSE_DATE = #{closeDate}

INSERT INTO ATMS_03001140 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, CLOSE_DATE, PREV_DAY_CASH_SENDING_AMT, DEPOSIT_AMT, GIVE_AMT, CLOSE_AMT, NONE_PROCESS_AMT, RTRVL_FUND, NONE_PROCESS_AT, MNG_OFFICE, ADJUST_LACK_AMT_COUNT, ADJUST_LACK_AMT ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{closeDate}, #{prevDayCashSendingAmt}, #{depositAmt}, #{giveAmt}, #{closeAmt}, #{noneProcessAmt}, #{rtrvlFund}, #{noneProcessAt}, #{mngOffice}, #{adjustLackAmtCount}, #{adjustLackAmt} )
